Articles.Content:
![2gZ9EDn.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/2gZ9EDn.jpg)

Nice job guys. The 1.0 release set a forum record for most concurrent members online!
Yeah!, We didn't get to see it because the list went down. Also there are 4000+ people on line right now! Awesome!

![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

*WHAT*?

And there is *still* over 4000 online, we are *still* over the last record.

Whoah, I came here expecting some Hypetrain thing. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Didn't notice this before, nice!
We did it! The hype is still going to last a couple more days.
I'm gonna guess that the list has a built-in kill switch when there are a lot of people online. WÃƒÂ¼nderbar!

You can correlate a portion of that record to a video uploaded by a certain brofisting someone...

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ho70DT1Fvdw?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

We also possibly broke a record on all forums:

6 pages in 20 seconds.

> 
> We also possibly broke a record on all forums:
> 6 pages in 20 seconds.

stop being proud of that ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif)

![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
We are breaking the record again!
Dang, breaks record with 1.0, then breaks record with 1.01. Go Squad!
I noticed that the records seem to be coming purely from guests, while member count stays the same. Squad's advertising (\*cough\* Pewdiepie \*cough\*) must be working!
Obviously the new members caused the release of 1.0.. ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)
